page.title: 20LIFE IN MARKET RASEN
page.content: Whilst having a small population, there is much in Market Rasen that towns with larger ones could be envious. The sporting facilities are good with golf and race courses. There are 7 pubs and a working mens' club offering the usual entertainments! The Festival Hall near the Market Place is the venue for many events. Dances,discos and concerts regularly are held and occasionally popular entertainers appear. The hall is also the focus of town occasions such as Xmas carol concerts and civic functions. The town retains its quiet atmosphere and life is leisurely.It is the focus of the small villages around it and in part retains the role it has had since the Middle Ages. Its pleasant site at the foot of the Wolds with wooded land and quiet footpaths make it a delightful place to live.
